name: A Left Adjoint that does not Preserve all Limits
definition: The tensor product functor $- \otimes M: \mathbf{Ab} \to \mathbf{Ab}$ for a fixed abelian group $M$ is a left adjoint (its right adjoint is $\text{Hom}(M,-)$). However, tensor product does not preserve all limits. For example, it does not preserve infinite products in general.
comments: Left adjoints preserve colimits but generally do not preserve limits.
